item.title: RoboSats: Private P2P Exchange
item.description: This guide by Bitcoin Q+A was published on bitcoiner.guide website. Contribute. noKYC # The de-facto way to obtain Bitcoin today, especially as a newcomer, is to do so through a regulated Bitcoin exchange. You hop onto a website, provide an egregious amount of your personal information, often including your name, address, banking details, drivers license and sometimes even a scan of your entire face or a recording of your voice!
